name: Hacked Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor

items.alias: Hacked Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** Since the standard issue can only be worn by Omni-Tek personnel, several groups started to develop ways of enabling it to be worn by any faction. Soon, not one, but two methods were developed which removed the OT restriction. Unfortunately both processes double the run speed handicap. *** #L "Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor" "204987" #L "Advanced Hacker Tool" "87814" #L "Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool" "164558" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor + Advanced Hacker Tool = #L "Hacked Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor" "204990" Skills: Hacker tool needs to be at least 40% the ql of Tank Armor. You'll need 5x Breaking and Entering skill to hack it. Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor + Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool = #L "Hacked Light Omni-Tek Artillery Tank Armor" "204990" FQP tool needs to be at least 40% the ql of Tank Armor. You'll need 5x Field Quantum Physics skill to hack it.
